Honolulu.Honolulu Waldorf School:
Honolulu Waldorf School, established in 1961, is a coeducational, independent school serving more than 300 children from early childhood through high school located on the island of Oahu in the State of Hawaii. The original Nursery through Grade 8 school, founded in 1961, is on a monkey pod tree-shaded campus in Honolulu’s Niu Valley (21°16.769′N 157°47.243′W) at 350 Ulua Street in Niu Valley.
The high school began in 1994 with its first freshmen class and graduated its first class of seniors in 1998.
